explains: n. 体育精神，运动员风范

sentences.en: Schools should foster children's interest in sports to instill into them the values of teamwork and sportsmanship.
sentences.cn: 学校应该培养孩子们对运动的兴趣，以教导他们合作和体育精神的价值。

sentences.en: Taking drugs before the Games isconsidered cheating and against sportsmanship.
sentences.cn: 赛前服用药物被视为作弊，且违背运动精神。
